pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, April 4, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Lévis, Quebec

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of Quebec, François Legault. He will be joined by the Minister of Public Services and Procurement, Helena Jaczek, and the Minister of Health, Jean-Yves Duclos.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media scrum.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Toronto, Ontario

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver the keynote address at the US-Canada Summit, hosted by the Eurasia Group and BMO Financial Group. The Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry, François-Philippe Champagne, will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:50 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
